title: New: Anthony Naples – El Portal EP
content:
Following Anthony Naples’ debut EP, Mad Disrespect, the young New York base producer has been flying pretty high, traveling around Europe and even finding time to remix the Four Tet track 128 harps.

His new EP, EI Portal, is a progression yet not a complete detachment from his previous effort. Full of dusty claps and thick and jaded wastelands, the record has a sleazy grove throughout that makes for something rather distinct if not altogether emotionally engaging.

The EP drops via The Trilogy Tapes this March.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
